data: This is my personal page where I archive some older work. I do creative coding for a living as 'digital workshop manager' at L'Ecole de design Nantes Atlantique. Note : this website is highly experimental and can be seen as an alternative way to present contents halfway between data visualisation and web design.
To find my teaching ressources about coding check out :
ם - desktop applications - for installation / performance / workshop
Δ - android applications - for music making with networking features and physics simulation
* - web applications - for audiovisual and interactive ready to go fun
move over those hashtags to light up the nodes matching them
